item.val: Marine House SEASIR started 1983 as a small marine sport center. Until today SEASIR group (Marine House SEASIR and Marine Club BERRY) is the longest and biggest Diving Company in Okinawa with multi-lingual instructors. With a tremendous and collaborating effort among SEASIR staffs, SEASIR Naha shop has been receiving “Dive and Travel Award” from the Diving magazine “Marine Diving” and ranks No.1 for 11 consecutive years.
※ Best Diving operation in JAPAN. Marine House SEASIR Naha received the award from 2003
Daily trip to KERAMA Scuba diving and Snorkeling.
Accommodation, Scuba diving, Snorkeling and Kayak.
Daily water sports and SEGWAY facility.
Guest House with dorm and private room in Naha.
